name: Amazing Duck
description:
Just a simple Platformer about the mascotte of the facebook page called 3Dudes (https://www.facebook.com/groups/333612093891448/).

In the game you will play a nice (but ugly) duck that will have to move from level to level trying to survive the enemies we encounter and trying to overcome every level thanks to our parkour ability!

Please, if you like the game, leave a donation to help me develop the game! Thank you!
